data.title: Digital Fingerprint Extraction
data.content: Captures fingerprint images using mobile cameras and matches them with existing fingerprints through the SIFT algorithm for efficient individual identification.

data.title: Khelo Hindustan
data.content: A comprehensive portal for automating and verifying the approval process of infrastructure projects across India under the Khelo India Scheme, ensuring efficiency and transparency in project management.

data.title: Voyager
data.content: A chatbot designed to streamline travel experiences by assisting with accommodation, dining, and emergency needs, while providing various sorting and filtering options for travel-related inquiries.

data.title: Democratic Desk
data.content: Integrated platform for all election-related processes, facilitating voter navigation and access to candidate information, assigned election booths, postal voting services, slot booking, and a demo for first-time voters.

data.title: Ecoledger
data.content: Leverages blockchain technology for transparent and secure monitoring of carbon emissions, enabling individuals and organizations to actively participate in carbon reduction initiatives and foster a sustainable future.

data.title: Xplore
data.content: A custom-built application designed for adventure enthusiasts, offering tailored experiences that continuously engage and invigorate their sense of excitement and adventure.
